org.asoem.greyfish.core.agent

Interface BasicContext<S extends DiscreteTimeEnvironment<A>,A extends Agent<?>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Context<S,A>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultActiveContext

    public interface BasicContext<S extends DiscreteTimeEnvironment<A>,A extends Agent<?>>
extends Context<S,A>
    A SimulationContext is the link between an Agent and a DiscreteTimeEnvironment. If an agent got activated a newly created context will be set for this agent.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getActivationStep()
      The step at which this agent was inserted into the getSimulation.
      long getAge()
      Get the age of this agent.
      long getSimulationStep()
      Get the current getSimulation step.
      long getTime()
      Get the current simulation time.
      java.lang.String simulationName() 

      • Methods inherited from interface org.asoem.greyfish.core.agent.Context

        getActiveAgents, getEnvironment

    • Method Detail

      • getActivationStep

        long getActivationStep()
        The step at which this agent was inserted into the getSimulation.
        Returns:
        the activation step

      • getAge

        long getAge()
        Get the age of this agent. Same as calling getSimulation().getSteps() - getActivationStep()
        Returns:
        the difference between the activation step and current step

      • getSimulationStep

        long getSimulationStep()
        Get the current getSimulation step. Delegates to DiscreteTime.getTime()
        Returns:
        the number of executed steps in the getSimulation

      • getTime

        long getTime()
        Get the current simulation time.

        Same as calling getSimulation().getTime()

        Returns:
        the current time of the simulation

      • simulationName

        java.lang.String simulationName()
